Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1000 WILSHIRE BOULEVARD,SUITE 500, LOS ANGELES, California, 90017, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: OP Bancorp is engaged in the financial service domain in the United States. It is a holding company of the Open Bank, which is a California state-chartered an FDIC-insured financial institution. The company core activities reflect accepting deposits and making loans and investments. Its deposit products are demand and time deposits, and the primary lending products are commercial business loans which are offered to small and medium-sized businesses.
